snippet: Italy’s prime minister is defending the plan, but it remains unclear how much support it might receive from the airline’s largest investor, Air France-KLM.

byline.original: By NICOLA CLARK and ELISABETTA POVOLEDO

lead_paragraph: Italy’s prime minister is defending the plan, but it remains unclear how much support it might receive from the airline’s largest investor, Air France-KLM.

headline.main: Shareholders Voting on Alitalia Bailout Plan
headline.print_headline: Shareholders Voting on Alitalia Bailout Plan
